title: Vase, "Red Army Soldier", 1933
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Four-sided, slightly tapered at middle; green bisque body with contrasting relief image of Red Army soldier on one side and Russian inscription in relief on opposite side, "Hail to the Anniversary of the Red Army."

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase, "Red Army Soldier", 1933.
1933. Porcelain (bisque). The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-84.
